price: 78. »y te verás privado de Mi misericordia hasta el Día del Juicio Final».
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
